kickUserByStreamId

public java.lang.Boolean kickUserByStreamId(java.lang.String SID,
                                            java.lang.String streamid,
                                            long serverId)
kicks a user from the server, also from slaves if needed, this method is only invoked by the connection administration UI

参数：
SID -
streamid -
serverId - 0 means the session is locally, otherwise we have to perform a REST call
返回：
- true if user has sufficient permissions, false otherwise

kickUserByPublicSID

public java.lang.Boolean kickUserByPublicSID(java.lang.String SID,
                                             java.lang.String publicSID)
Kick a user by its publicSID.

Note: This method will not perform a call to the slave, cause this call can only be invoked from inside the conference room, that means all clients are on the same server, no matter if clustered or not.

参数：
SID -
publicSID -
返回：
- true in case user have sufficient permissions, null otherwise
概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架
